article_title: California State Tax Cops Hunt Millions

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: California taxes are notoriously high. Even capital gains are taxed as ordinary income. California's tax man is going after non-filers who earn in the state but don't file.
og.title: California State Tax Cops Hunt Millions: 'We Will Find You'
